Russia warns Japan over providing Patriot air defence systems to UkraineA move by Japan to provide Patriot air defence systems to Ukraine will have "grave consequences" for Russia-Japan ties, Russian foreign ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 10:45:02 GMT 6SWOPOLPMBOSTCQL52ZFLEQXMY https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-warns-japan-over-providing-patriot-air-defence-systems-ukraine-2023-12-27/Reuters世界
Over 40 hospitalised after gas leak at fertiliser unit in India's Tamil NaduAt least 44 people were hospitalised after an ammonia leak from a pipeline belonging to Coromandel International near its Ennore plant in the southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, hospital sources said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 10:40:42 GMT FEKPKBDEXBOKNKH44ZJUMD7P54 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/over-40-hospitalized-after-gas-leak-fertiliser-unit-indias-tamil-nadu-2023-12-27/Praveen Paramasivam, Nandan Mandayam世界印度
Worker killed in explosion at Indian Oil Corp's Chennai plantOne worker was killed and another injured in an explosion at state-run refiner Indian Oil Corp's (IOC) plant in the southern Indian city of Chennai on Wednesday, two fire department officials told Reuters. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 10:39:56 GMT 5HPOCNXB4JO5VBELRFAF4JQI34 https://www.reuters.com/world/india/one-dead-explosion-indian-oil-corps-chennai-plant-2023-12-27/Reuters世界印度
UAE's Sharjah bans New Year's Eve fireworks over Gaza warAn emirate in the United Arab Emirates, one of few Arab states that has official ties with Israel, has banned New Year's Eve fireworks this year as an expression of solidarity with the people of Gaza. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 10:24:07 GMT Q27RAAQB3JJPPK2MK37T335JUI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/uaes-sharjah-bans-new-years-eve-fireworks-over-gaza-war-2023-12-27/Reuters世界中东
Congo deploys riot police ahead of banned anti-election protestRiot police massed in the centre of Democratic Republic of Congo's capital Kinshasa on Wednesday as the authorities moved to block a protest by the opposition who are calling for a re-run of last week's chaotic national election. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 10:01:51 GMT VHG6YC3NIZOL3MJXXPSXV5MUZA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-deploys-riot-police-ahead-banned-anti-election-protest-2023-12-27/Reuters世界非洲
Russia tells South Korea not to be surprised if Moscow retaliates over sanctionsRussia told South Korea on Wednesday not to be surprised if Moscow retaliates against Seoul for expanding the list of goods which cannot be exported from the East Asian nation to Russia without special permission. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 09:56:21 GMT JN65GJBJSZORLC4DLQDIYZ6PRA https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-tells-south-korea-not-be-surprized-if-moscow-retaliates-over-sanctions-2023-12-27/Reuters世界
South Korean capital drills to guard against surprise attack by NorthMore than 1,000 South Korean military, police and emergency personnel joined rare defence drills on Wednesday that simulated an attack by North Korea on Seoul, to counter fears the city is in striking distance of Pyongyang's weapons and covert attack. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 08:49:02 GMT HH7574J7JZOHLFPKGF3LVT3RZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korean-capital-drills-guard-against-surprise-attack-by-north-2023-12-27/Daewoung Kim, Jimin Jung世界亚太地区
What is Egypt's proposal for Gaza?Egypt has held talks between Hamas and its allied Islamic Jihad to try and broker a permanent ceasefire in Israel's war in the Gaza Strip, which has killed tens of thousands, laid waste to the Hamas-governed territory, and displaced the majority of the 2.3 million Palestinian residents. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 08:41:44 GMT ZKKKTBGLT5IQDM3KER53ST6B7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/what-is-egypts-proposal-gaza-2023-12-27/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Dan Williams, And Ahmed Mohamed Hassan世界中东
Wolfgang Schaeuble, veteran of German politics, dies at 81Wolfgang Schaeuble, who served as a member of the German parliament for over half a century, has died aged 81, ending one of Germany's longest political careers in which he helped secure his country's place at the heart of Europe. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 08:15:16 GMT SMDIJDQHFZKWTHCHRR4EZSHV3U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/wolfgang-schaeuble-veteran-german-politics-dies-81-reports-2023-12-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Two killed in Russian drone attack - Ukrainian authoritiesTwo people were killed after Russian forces sent dozens of attack drones over Ukraine in an overnight air strike, Ukrainian authorities said on Wednesday. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 07:42:15 GMT HC2DJYN4KNNU7NDTBNAMONCP24 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/one-killed-russ-latest-drone-attack-ukrainian-authorities-2023-12-27/Reuters世界欧洲
Iran dismisses IAEA report on uranium enrichment -Iranian mediaIran's atomic energy chief Mohammad Eslami on Wednesday said there was "nothing new" in an international nuclear watchdog report saying that Tehran had reversed a months-long slowdown in its uranium enrichment programme, Iranian media reported. Wed, 27 Dec 2023 07:33:49 GMT G63PS4C4FNJ2ZGNX34XBPI6AN4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-dismisses-iaea-report-uranium-enrichment-iranian-media-2023-12-27/Reuters世界中东
